body: Seems sweet at first but she's definitely a slut
Agreed Fap God.  And yeah she said shed be only his though which is a good ending at least.
still ended as "friends" which makes her a total slut...

Right, the "story" kinda doesn't make sense, her saying that he's dumb, for what? for saying that she was his mashiro since the beginning? implying that she always has been his? but sleeping around as stated? I think it would've been better if he fucked her brains out and made her his. but still it ended that way albeit only as "friends". lmao thinking  this deep on a  20 page doujin from a year ago.

Yeah what did she mean when she said he was dumb? I thought it was gonna be a reveal like she'd always been saving herself for him or something like that but nah she was fuckin around just like he said - so what did she mean by saying he was wrong. Did she used to love him and then gave up and became a gal/slut until now? Feels like a hunk of story is missing. I mean hes got a huge cock, he should fuck around and make her jealous too, that'd be a good sequel.
why did she become a gal/ slut? >.<
